title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file and get an AI-powered analysis of what the data represents, including column insights and content summary

pages.name: Upload
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop or browse to upload a CSV file

pages.name: Analysis
pages.purpose: Display AI-generated summary of the CSV’s topic, key columns, and data patterns

interactions: User drops CSV → parse with Papa → store raw & parsed
On parse complete → call window.geaRuntimeLLM to analyze
Display returned summary and column insights
User clicks Download → generate PDF with jsPDF
acceptancecriteria: Accepts any CSV with no predefined schema
Shows upload errors in clear language
Lists top 5 column interpretations with confidence %
Persists last analysis in local storage
